entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -17.9°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
